About me

I'm a 22 years old Kurd based in üìç Cologne, Germany. Currently, I work as a DevOps Engineer at NetCologne.

I specialize in developing desktop applications using C++ and The Qt Framework. Python is my preferred choice for scripting. Additionally, I possess fundamental knowledge in web development, including PHP with Laravel, as well as Java Spring Boot. While I have a grasp of basic HTML and CSS, my experience in the web world is still evolving.

View Resume

Projects

MathMentor

The main goal of this project is to provide a tool for the students of the Vocational School Hallein to further develop their knowledge of mathematics in the areas of formula manipulation, conversion of SI units, and percentage calculations. Additionally, the activity of the students on the platform is monitored by the teaching staff in order to provide more targeted support later on. The platform was developed using the Java programming language and the Spring Boot framework and a PostgreSQL database.

Closed Source

QLinac

The electronic operating diary is a database application for the radiotherapy department of the University Hospital in Salzburg. Developed in C++ and Qt6, it utilizes a MySQL database. Deployment is done as a virtual Citrix application.

Closed Source

QRapidSum

A desktop application in C++ & Qt6 for creating and validating checksums. It is used within the Computer Science team of the Radiotherapy department at the Salzburg State Hospitals. Deployment: As a virtual Citrix application.

Closed Source
